summary: This document appears to be a signature card from Deutsche Bank related to Jeffrey Epstein's accounts. It includes references to account management and power of attorney, indicating financial arrangements involving Epstein and possibly others.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as the account holder for a financial account at Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is mentioned in the context of having power of attorney related to Epstein's financial matters.

persons.name: Jeanne Brennan
persons.context: Jeanne Brennan is referenced in relation to the management of the account associated with Epstein.

connections.description: Darren Indyke holds power of attorney for Jeffrey Epstein, indicating a legal relationship where Indyke can act on Epstein's behalf.
Jeanne Brennan is involved in managing the financial account for Jeffrey Epstein, indicating a professional relationship.

keyFacts: The document is a signature card from Deutsche Bank related to Jeffrey Epstein's financial accounts.
Darren Indyke is noted as having power of attorney for Jeffrey Epstein.
Jeanne Brennan is mentioned as an account manager associated with Epstein's accounts.
